snippet: Two leading British bookmakers have suspended betting on Chelsea's Antonio Conte becoming the next Premier League manager to be given the sack....

headline.main: Bookmakers Suspend Betting on Conte Leaving Chelsea
headline.print_headline: Bookmakers Suspend Betting on Conte Leaving Chelsea

lead_paragraph: Two leading British bookmakers have suspended betting on Chelsea's Antonio Conte becoming the next Premier League manager to be given the sack.

snippet: Manchester United manager Jose Mourinho has been banned from the touchline for one match and fined a total of 58,000 pounds ($71,000) for two separate incidents of misconduct last month, the FA said on Wednesday....

headline.main: Mourinho Handed Touchline Ban, Heavy Fine
headline.print_headline: Mourinho Handed Touchline Ban, Heavy Fine

lead_paragraph: Manchester United manager Jose Mourinho has been banned from the touchline for one match and fined a total of 58,000 pounds ($71,000) for two separate incidents of misconduct last month, the FA said on Wednesday.

snippet: Watford bade a warm farewell to their departing manager Quique Sanchez Flores on Sunday with his players marking the occasion by fighting back twice to earn a draw with Sunderland....

headline.main: Watford Say Farewell to Sanchez Flores With Fighting Draw
headline.print_headline: Watford Say Farewell to Sanchez Flores With Fighting Draw

lead_paragraph: Watford bade a warm farewell to their departing manager Quique Sanchez Flores on Sunday with his players marking the occasion by fighting back twice to earn a draw with Sunderland.

snippet: West Ham United have signed young Valencia striker Toni Martinez, the Premier League club said on Friday....

headline.main: West Ham Sign Valencia Teenager Martinez
headline.print_headline: West Ham Sign Valencia Teenager Martinez

lead_paragraph: West Ham United have signed young Valencia striker Toni Martinez, the Premier League club said on Friday.

snippet: A Thai monk believes good karma with help England's Leicester City Football Club in their chase to win their first English Premier League title....

headline.main: Thai Monk Says Good Karma Will Aid Leicester City's Football Club in Title Bid
headline.print_headline: Thai Monk Says Good Karma Will Aid Leicester City's Football Club in Title Bid

lead_paragraph: A Thai monk believes good karma with help England's Leicester City Football Club in their chase to win their first English Premier League title.

snippet: Tough-tackling Everton midfielder Muhamed Besic has signed a new five-and-a-half-year contract, the Premier League club said....

headline.main: Everton Midfielder Besic Signs New Long-Term Contract
headline.print_headline: Everton Midfielder Besic Signs New Long-Term Contract

lead_paragraph: Tough-tackling Everton midfielder Muhamed Besic has signed a new five-and-a-half-year contract, the Premier League club said.

snippet: Aston Villa owner Randy Lerner is closer to finding a buyer than at any time since putting the club up for sale in 2014, according to a BBC report on Wednesday....

headline.main: Chinese Buyer Closing on Aston Villa Deal-Report
headline.print_headline: Chinese Buyer Closing on Aston Villa Deal-Report

lead_paragraph: Aston Villa owner Randy Lerner is closer to finding a buyer than at any time since putting the club up for sale in 2014, according to a BBC report on Wednesday.

snippet: - New manager Bob Bradley saw his Swansea side end their streak of four successive Premier League defeats with a 0-0 draw against Watford on Saturday in his first home match in charge of the Welsh club....

headline.main: Bradley's Swansea End Slump but Fail to Beat Watford
headline.print_headline: Bradley's Swansea End Slump but Fail to Beat Watford

lead_paragraph: - New manager Bob Bradley saw his Swansea side end their streak of four successive Premier League defeats with a 0-0 draw against Watford on Saturday in his first home match in charge of the Welsh club.

snippet: Britain's police watchdog says two officers are under criminal investigation over the death of a former Premier League soccer player who was shot with a stun gun by police....

headline.main: 2 Police Face Criminal Probe in Taser Death of Ex-Footballer
headline.print_headline: 2 Police Face Criminal Probe in Taser Death of Ex-Footballer

lead_paragraph: Britain's police watchdog says two officers are under criminal investigation over the death of a former Premier League soccer player who was shot with a stun gun by police.

snippet: Middlesbrough have signed Dutch defensive midfielder Marten De Roon on a four-year contract from Serie A side Atalanta, the Premier League club said on their website (www.mfc.co.uk)....

headline.main: Middlesbrough Sign Dutch Midfielder De Roon From Atalanta
headline.print_headline: Middlesbrough Sign Dutch Midfielder De Roon From Atalanta

lead_paragraph: Middlesbrough have signed Dutch defensive midfielder Marten De Roon on a four-year contract from Serie A side Atalanta, the Premier League club said on their website (www.mfc.co.uk).
